FeatureSection.subheading: Curated maritime tools designed to streamline the luxury boat buying experience.

features.title: Global Vessel Finder
features.description: Search worldwide listings with filters for length, draft, engine hours, and shipyard.

features.title: Marine Survey Auditor
features.description: Comprehensive digital audits identifying maintenance history and vessel condition.

features.title: Market Comparison
features.description: Monitor similar listings to ensure you are getting the best value in the current market.

features.title: Charter Ready Reporting
features.description: Professional documentation and ROI projections for yachts entering charter programs.

features.title: AI Value Estimation
features.description: Daily price analysis based on global sales data and shipyard trends.

features.title: Maintenance Alerts
features.description: Instant notifications for scheduled service, winterization, and dockage renewals.

AudienceSection.subheading: Whether you are a first-time buyer or a fleet owner, NauticSell scales to your lifestyle.

audiences.title: Private Owners

audiences.title: Charter Agencies
audiences.description: Ideal for companies managing multiple yachts with white-label inventory and availability tracking.

audiences.title: Independent Brokers
audiences.description: Built for brokers who need powerful CRM and listing tools to close deals faster.

ContactPage.title: Inquire Today

AboutPage.title: About NauticSell
AboutPage.subtitle: We are on a mission to make yacht ownership accessible, transparent, and digital-first.

story.title: The NauticSell Story
story.content:
In the traditional maritime world, buying a boat was unnecessarily complex. Buyers were lost in paperwork and opaque pricing.

We founded NauticSell with a simple belief: Every captain deserves access to elite maritime technology, regardless of their vessel size.

We are a technology-first brokerage platform that puts the power of AI-driven market analysis in your hands, working 24/7 to find your next horizon.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To digitize the shipyard-to-sea pipeline, making luxury yachting accessible to a new generation of owners through data and transparency.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where the sea is closer than ever, and vessel ownership is as simple as a single tap on your screen.

values.title: Maritime Standards
values.subtitle: Our values guide every listing we host and every client we serve.

values.title: Integrity First
values.description: Transparency in vessel history and pricing is our baseline. No hidden damages, no hidden fees.

values.title: Precision Guided
values.description: Our AI helps navigate market fluctuations to ensure your maritime investment is sound.

values.title: Community Driven
values.description: NauticSell is built for mariners. Your seafaring needs shape our technology.

journey.title: Our Voyage
journey.subtitle: From a local harbor idea to serving thousands of mariners worldwide.

milestones.title: The Launch
milestones.description: Founded to modernize the yacht brokerage experience.

milestones.title: Digital Fleet
milestones.description: Launched our offshore-first PWA for global yacht management.

milestones.title: Full Sail
milestones.description: Connecting 10,000+ owners with their dream vessels globally.

whyUs.title: Why NauticSell?
whyUs.subtitle: We aren't just a listing site. We are your digital first mate.

Faq.title: How may we assist you?

faq.a1: Yes. Upgrades are immediate, with pro-rated adjustments applied to your obsidian account.
faq.a2: We offer a 14-day discovery period for all Professional tiers to experience our intelligence layers.
faq.a3: All transactions are encrypted via bank-grade protocols and secured by Stripe.
faq.a4: You may terminate your membership at any time. Your access remains active until the end of the cycle.
